about-face.options.scene-enabled.name: Enable About Face on this scene
about-face.options.scene-enabled.hint: Rotates tokens when moving them (except when locked). If disabled, can still hold shift to rotate in place
about-face.options.portrait-mode.name: Portrait Mode
about-face.options.portrait-mode.hint: Disables token rotation. Direction indicators will still rotate as usual.
about-face.options.enable-indicator.name: Enable token indicators
about-face.options.enable-indicator.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to tokens
about-face.options.flip-direction.name: Flip or Rotate the token
about-face.options.flip-direction.hint: Instead of rotating the token, flip it
about-face.options.indicator-sprite.name: Indicator Icon
about-face.options.indicator-sprite.choi: Hex Indicator (Only works on Hex Columns)
